long_description: A running top with a fitted hood and warm hand mitts for cold-weather workouts, the women's Sugoi Speedster 3 top delivers moisture-wicking performance to keep skin dry during exercise. Stretchy moisture-wicking, midweight base layer is fleeced on the inside for amazing comfort. Features a form-fitting hood with a sleek funnel neckline and self-bound finish; quarter-zip ventilates to prevent overheating. Raglan sleeves enhance fit, allowing freedom of movement. Mitted cuffs with thumbholes sit on the wrists or cover hands for added warmth. Closeout.
short_description: A running top with a fitted hood and warm hand mitts for cold-weather workouts, the women's Sugoi Speedster 3 top delivers moisture-wicking performance to keep skin dry during exercise.
